snippet: Yes, Violet was beloved, but it would be rude of us to refer to the female that next stepped into her widower's life as "her." Please help decide what City Room will call her.
abstract: Yes, Violet was beloved, but it would be rude of us to refer to the female that next stepped into her widower's life as "her." Please help decide what City Room will call her.
lead_paragraph: Updated, Jan. 9 p.m. | Voting is now closed. Thanks very much.

headline.main: Help Us Name the New Lady Hawk in Bobby's Life
